EmailTemplate.name: Approval notification - internship
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - We’ve approved your Architect Experience Program (AXP) internship application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’ve approved your application!
You may now start your Architect Experience Program (AXP) internship.
Go to www.ncarb.org to register and start your internship.
Questions? Need help? {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Email__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP006
